verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tupeleke vipaji vyetu
tukamtolee Bwana (pia),
pia na nafsi zetu,
tukamtolee Bwana
ili azibarikie. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mali zetu zote
tumpelekee Bwana,
tunamuomba azitakase
ziwe safi sana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kazi ya mikono
yetu tunamtolea Bwana,
ili iwe shukrani kwake,
Mungu muumba wetu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yeye ndiye muumba
na anatupenda sisi,
wajibu wetu siku
zote tumtumikie.
